Item.name: RAT_Risk_Rollup
Item.sqlserver_body:
CREATE TRIGGER [RAT_Risk_Rollup] ON [innovator].[RAT_Project] FOR UPDATE AS /* This trigger rolls up the risk from worksheets on this RAT Project */
UPDATE RAT_Project SET max_rating = (select sum(CAST(probability_c as Integer) * CAST(cost_impact_c as Integer) * CAST(technical_impact_c as integer) * CAST(schedule_impact_c as Integer)) from RAT_Worksheet where RAT_Worksheet.source_id=RAT_Project.id) from RAT_Project, inserted where RAT_Project.id=inserted.id
